solution_line_template: She earned $42.5 on average per week because {total_money} / {num_weeks} = <<{total_money}/{num_weeks}={avg_money_per_week}>>{avg_money_per_week}

She earned $22.5 each week from extra chores because {avg_money_per_week} - {fixed_allowance_per_week} = <<{avg_money_per_week}-{fixed_allowance_per_week}={money_from_extra_chores_per_week}>>{money_from_extra_chores_per_week}

She did 15 extra chores a week because {money_from_extra_chores_per_week} / {money_per_extra_chore} = <<{money_from_extra_chores_per_week}/{money_per_extra_chore}={avg_extra_chores_per_week}>>{avg_extra_chores_per_week}
